sentence.Network_en: And then I heard the voice of Captain Smollett issuing orders.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时,我听到了斯摩莱特船长发布命令的声音.

sentence.Network_en: 'I have a chart here,'says Captain Smollett.'see if that's the place.'
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我这里有张图, ”斯摩莱特船长说道, “ 你看看是不是这地方. ”

sentence.Network_en: 'My lads,'said Captain Smollett,'I've a word to say to you.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 伙计们, ”斯摩莱特船长说, “ 我有话对大家说.
